jobDescription: Sr. Deep Learning Engineer/Scientist  If you are a Deep Learning Engineer looking to join a startup that has created a vision based machine learning platform that is offering a tracking solution used to solve for segmentation within in the motion picture and television industry, please read on!  Based in Palo Alto, CA near the Shoreline Golf Course and Charleston Gardens, we are a small (~20 person team) venture back, well funded startup having some fun with neural networks and computer vision! We are collaborating with major studios, industry veterans, and award-winning artists to re-invent the filmmaking process with self-improving AI at its core  Were immersed in cool vision work that has to perform at cinematic levels of quality. Subpixel segmentation, precise object tracking, human tracking and rigging, lighting and relighting, SLAM, leveraging geometric vision in 2D and 3D, on up to solving the inverse rendering problem.  Yes, youll be working with filmmakers, musicians, game producers and, later, probably sports capture. Yes, well publish at major ML conferences, at Siggraph and relevant trade shows.What You Will Be Doing
